package com.java.assignment1;

public class Arithmatic {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int x=5, y=10;
		
		System.out.println("(x+y)*2="+((x+y)*2));
		System.out.println("(x+y*2)="+(x+y*2));
		System.out.println("x-y+2="+(x-y+2));
		System.out.println("y%x="+(y%x));
		
	}

}
